summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Fremont Avenue from the south margin of North 34th Street to North 36th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing a street lighting system and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7525 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
